entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story who is interacting with Travers.

entities.name: travers
entities.description: Travers is a Death Eater who has been summoned to Xenophilius's house and is trying to greet Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a character in the story who is interacting with Travers and trying to cover up her mistake.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a Death Eater who breathes that Travers is another Death Eater.

relationships.description: Harry and Travers are interacting with each other, with Harry recognizing Travers's voice as one of the Death Eaters summoned to Xenophilius's house.
Hermione and Travers are interacting with each other, with Hermione trying to cover up her mistake when she recognizes Travers.
Griphook labels Travers as another Death Eater.
